Text.Page:
Once we get the mission to kill the Gutrend chief underway, the rest are going to start coming after us in huge waves. We'll want to drop as many as we can before that happens.

Go out and kill as many as you can before we get started. Keep a special eye out for the {@LinkCreature:6#2081#Gutrend Seers} and {@LinkCreature:6#2082#Juggernauts} in Mags Kulkar. They'll be the hardest to deal with when the time comes.
Great, good, excellent! You've done a good job. Hopefully that will hold them back once the real job starts.
